title: Replace auto-inserted illustrations with empty user-controlled upload placeholders and update Gujarati business content

requirements.text: Replace all auto-inserted/generated images across the site with strictly empty, optional, user-controlled image placeholders that include an “Upload Image / Add Image” UI in the image area, and ensure the website still looks complete and professional when no images are provided.

quotes:
IMPORTANT IMAGE RULES (STRICT):
- Do NOT auto-insert random or stock images
- Create image sections with EMPTY placeholders only
- Show “Upload Image / Add Image” option in image areas
- Images must be optional and fully user-controlled
- Website should look complete even without images

acceptanceCriteria: No pages render any default illustration/icon image (e.g., no /assets/generated/... images displayed by default).
Each image area renders an empty placeholder UI with a visible call-to-action equivalent to “Upload Image / Add Image”.
Users can select an image file from their device and see a preview replacing the placeholder in that specific image area.
If a user does not upload an image, the section layout remains visually complete (no broken-image icons, no awkward empty gaps).
No stock images or AI-generated images are automatically inserted anywhere.

requirements.text: Update the image component(s) used across pages (currently the ReplaceableImage component) so that it supports empty-state placeholders and user uploads (client-side), rather than requiring a src URL.

quotes: Create image sections with EMPTY placeholders only
Show “Upload Image / Add Image” option in image areas

acceptanceCriteria: The shared image component can render with no image provided (empty state).
The shared image component provides a file input / upload interaction directly in the image area.
The shared image component does not require a non-empty src prop to function.
Any existing “replaceable” labeling is updated to align with the new upload placeholder UX (Gujarati UI text).

requirements.text: Update all Gujarati site content to match the provided business scope and details: include Ladies, Gents & Kids tailoring (work-from-home), owner name, working hours, mobile number, and add the full address on the Contact page.

quotes: Business Type: Ladies, Gents & Kids Tailoring (Work From Home)

Address:
  Plot No. 10,
  Keshav Township,
  Opposite Trinity School,
  Sabarkantha Road,
  Talod – 383305

acceptanceCriteria: Home, About, Services, and Contact pages all use formal Gujarati-only text for headings, paragraphs, buttons, and labels.
The Contact page displays the complete multi-line address exactly as provided.
Mobile number 7359316413 is highlighted and clickable via a tel: link where appropriate.
Working hours are displayed as 7:00 AM to 9:00 PM (Gujarati rendering is acceptable as long as the time range matches).
About page explicitly states work-from-home and includes the owner name Patel Geetaben J. in Gujarati.

requirements.text: Replace the Services page list with the new set of services (written in formal Gujarati) provided by the user, and include optional empty image placeholders for service-related images/icons (user uploaded).

quotes:
SERVICES (WRITE IN FORMAL GUJARATI):
- Ladies blouse stitching (simple and designer)
- Navratri special chaniya choli stitching
- Fancy dress and western dress stitching
- Normal gents kurta stitching
- Kurta stitching for children
- Saree lace (less pati) stitching service

acceptanceCriteria: Services page displays exactly 6 services matching the user-provided list (in formal Gujarati).
Each service row/card includes an optional upload placeholder area for an icon/image, with “Upload Image / Add Image” UI.
No pre-filled service icons are shown by default.
Services layout remains clean and readable on mobile and desktop.

requirements.text: Add the user’s “Important Note” copy prominently (in formal Gujarati) on an appropriate page section (e.g., Home and/or Services and/or About) so it is clearly visible to visitors.

quotes:
IMPORTANT NOTE (Must be mentioned clearly):
- Ladies, gents and children’s garment fitting services are provided
- All stitching services are offered at affordable and reasonable prices
- Quality finishing, proper fitting and timely delivery are our priorities

acceptanceCriteria: The site includes Gujarati text clearly stating: (1) fitting services for ladies/gents/kids are provided, (2) affordable/reasonable pricing, (3) quality finishing, proper fitting, timely delivery.
The note is displayed as a distinct, readable block (e.g., card or callout) and is easy to find without needing images.
All text remains Gujarati-only and matches the formal/professional tone.

constraints: Do not auto-insert any stock/AI/random images anywhere; all images must be optional and user-controlled via upload placeholders.
All visible website text must be Gujarati-only and use a Gujarati-compatible font across the site.
Follow the strict design rules: background white or very light cream; normal text black; shop name “Gayatri Ladies Tailor” styled as large, elegant, dark red.
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other frontend immutablePaths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Implementing backend storage for uploaded images (uploads may remain client-side only unless explicitly requested later).
Adding new pages beyond Home, About Us, Services, and Contact Us.
Changing authentication or adding third-party integrations.
